item.name: This API is to onboard recipient profile on Digital Disbursement Platform.

request.name: This API is to onboard recipient profile on Digital Disbursement Platform.

description.content: This API is to onboard recipient profile on Digital Disbursement Platform.

header.description: (Required) An API key is a string value passed by a client app to the API proxies. The key uniquely identifies the client app.
(Required) Epoch timestamp in the request initiating system

(Required) Contains a unique ID generated by the client that can be used for enforcing idempotency on POST actions. POSTs are inherently non-idempotent and submitting the exact same request multiple times would create duplicate resources.
Note:- Omitting this header increases the risk of duplicate transactions.
(Required) An API key is a string value passed by a client app to the API proxies. The key uniquely identifies the client app.
(Required) Epoch timestamp in the request initiating system
(Required) Authorization information for the request. Format- `HMAC {hmacToken}`

(Required) Contains a unique ID generated by the client that can be used for enforcing idempotency on POST actions. POSTs are inherently non-idempotent and submitting the exact same request multiple times would create duplicate resources.
Note:- Omitting this header increases the risk of duplicate transactions.
(Required) used to indicate the media type of the resource.

item.name: This API is fetch the  recipient profile on Digital Disbursement Platform.

request.name: This API is fetch the  recipient profile on Digital Disbursement Platform.

description.content: This API is fetch the  recipient profile on Digital Disbursement Platform.

variable.description: (Required) Unique Id associated with Recipient Profile while set up. The value can be MerchantCustomerId or RecipientId. Merchant provision through Apigee should always pass MerchantCustomerId.

header.description: (Required) An API key is a string value passed by a client app to the API proxies. The key uniquely identifies the client app.
(Required) Epoch timestamp in the request initiating system

(Required) Contains a unique ID generated by the client that can be used for enforcing idempotency on POST actions. POSTs are inherently non-idempotent and submitting the exact same request multiple times would create duplicate resources.
Note:- Omitting this header increases the risk of duplicate transactions.

response.name: Success

variable.description: (Required) Unique Id associated with Recipient Profile while set up. The value can be MerchantCustomerId or RecipientId. Merchant provision through Apigee should always pass MerchantCustomerId.

header.description: (Required) An API key is a string value passed by a client app to the API proxies. The key uniquely identifies the client app.
(Required) Epoch timestamp in the request initiating system
(Required) Authorization information for the request. Format- `HMAC {hmacToken}`

(Required) Contains a unique ID generated by the client that can be used for enforcing idempotency on POST actions. POSTs are inherently non-idempotent and submitting the exact same request multiple times would create duplicate resources.
Note:- Omitting this header increases the risk of duplicate transactions.
(Required) used to indicate the media type of the resource.

response.body:
{
  "merchant": [
    {
      "merchantCustomerId": "<string>"
    }
  ],
  "recipient": {
    "recipientType": "Consumer",
    "firstName": "First Name",
    "lastName": "Last Name",
    "doingBusinessAs": "Last Name",
    "emailAddress": {
      "value": "bjensen@example.com",
      "type": "work",
      "primary": true
    },
    "address": {
      "type": "<string>",
      "street": "<string>",
      "houseNumberOrName": "<string>",
      "city": "<string>",
      "stateOrProvince": "<string>",
      "postalCode": "<string>",
      "country": "<string>",
      "formatted": "<string>",
      "primary": "<boolean>"
    },
    "guest": true,
    "recipientId": "0d3c99f9-d7dd-4e0e-9c86-71d189ecdc95",
    "dateOfBirth": "11/11/2011",
    "tin": "345-55-2345",
    "ssn": "633-55-2345",
    "preferredLanguage": "EN-US",
    "phoneNumber": {
      "countryCode": "USA",
      "value": "704-884-2754",
      "type": "billing",
      "extension": "2145"
    },
    "status": "ACTIVE",
    "reason": "CLIENT_INITIATED",
    "description": "New Recipient",
    "createdBy": "User1234",
    "updatedBy": "User1235"
  },
  "pages": {
    "firstPage": true,
    "lastPage": false,
    "currentPage": 1,
    "currentPageRecords": 25,
    "totalPages": 2,
    "totalRecords": 27,
    "sortOrder": "asc",
    "_links": [
      {
        "href": "http://rigMXFBrDXnZttNbkZEfRIpqhAUjAFX.ghxmTGjpGagKFWhdZ9Oa",
        "rel": "self",
        "method": "GET"
      },
      {
        "href": "http://mrCi.xhwyqjESk5Pg-Tv-uKjAxjyYAwy74v3vn",
        "rel": "self",
        "method": "GET"
      }
    ]
  }
}

description.content: This Specification document lists the APIs required to onboard Recipient Profile on Digital Disbursement portal.
